test_suite.suite_name: GAMP Category 5 - Operational Qualification Test Suite

tests.test_name: User Authentication and Access Control Verification
tests.description: Verify that the system enforces proper user authentication and role-based access control as per 21 CFR Part 11 requirements
tests.objective: Ensure only authorized users can access the system and perform actions within their assigned privileges
prerequisites: Test environment configured with test user accounts
User roles and permissions matrix defined

test_steps.description: Attempt to access system without credentials
test_steps.expected_result: System displays login screen and denies access
System grants access and displays administrator dashboard

test_steps.description: Verify audit trail captures login event
test_steps.expected_result: Audit log shows timestamp, user ID, and successful login action

tests.expected_results: System enforces authentication and maintains compliant audit trail
tests.acceptance_criteria: All access attempts are properly authenticated and logged
tests.gamp5_alignment: Addresses GAMP 5 Category 5 requirements for configurable software
tests.data_recording_requirements: Screenshot evidence and audit log extracts required

tests.test_name: Data Integrity and ALCOA+ Compliance Verification
tests.description: Verify system maintains data integrity according to ALCOA+ principles throughout data lifecycle
tests.objective: Ensure data remains Attributable, Legible, Contemporaneous, Original, and Accurate
prerequisites: System operational with audit trail enabled

test_steps.description: Create new data record with all required fields
test_steps.expected_result: System captures user identity, timestamp, and data values
System maintains original value and records change with reason
Exported data includes all metadata and audit trail

tests.expected_results: Data integrity maintained throughout all operations
tests.gamp5_alignment: Critical quality attribute for Category 5 systems
tests.data_recording_requirements: Complete audit trail extracts and data lifecycle documentation

tests.description: Verify electronic signature functionality meets 21 CFR Part 11 Subpart C requirements
tests.objective: Ensure electronic signatures are linked to records and include required components
prerequisites: Test users with signature privileges configured

test_steps.description: Attempt to sign record with invalid credentials
test_steps.expected_result: System rejects signature attempt and logs security event
System captures signature with user ID, timestamp, and meaning

test_steps.description: Verify signature cannot be removed or altered

tests.expected_results: Electronic signatures meet all regulatory requirements
tests.acceptance_criteria: Signatures are secure, attributable, and permanent
tests.gamp5_alignment: Essential control for Category 5 validated systems
tests.data_recording_requirements: Signed records and signature manifestation evidence

test_environment_requirements.user_accounts: Test accounts with various privilege levels

execution_instructions.prerequisites_verification: Verify all prerequisites before starting each test
execution_instructions.evidence_collection: Capture screenshots and system outputs as specified
